chapter.title: Command reference
chapter.para: You can get the complet command reference by using help command in Peergreen Server's shell :

section.title: Scope 'gogo'
section.screen: Scope 'gogo' (20 commands) ----------------------------------- gogo:format gogo:format gogo:getopt gogo:new gogo:set gogo:tac gogo:type gogo:gosh gogo:sh gogo:source gogo:cat gogo:if gogo:not gogo:throw gogo:throw gogo:throw gogo:try gogo:try gogo:until gogo:while

section.title: Scope 'obr
section.screen: Scope 'obr' (6 commands) ----------------------------------- obr:deploy deploy resource from repository obr:info retrieve resource description from repository obr:javadoc retrieve resource JavaDoc from repository obr:list list repository resources obr:repos manage repositories obr:source retrieve resource source code from repository

section.title: Scope 'arch'
section.screen: Scope 'arch' (5 commands) ----------------------------------- arch:handlers List the handlers factories arch:instance Display information about one given Component instance arch:factories List the iPOJO component factories. arch:factory Display information about one given Component Factory arch:instances List the component instances

section.title: Scope 'shelbie'
section.screen: Scope 'shelbie' (9 commands) ----------------------------------- shelbie:echo Echoes or prints arguments to STDOUT. shelbie:grep Prints lines matching the given pattern. shelbie:clear Clear the console. shelbie:exit Exit from the current session (and shutdown the system if the shell is local) shelbie:each Execute a closure on a list of arguments. shelbie:shutdown Shutdown the OSGi platform shelbie:history Manage the session's history. shelbie:help Display command's help shelbie:unset Unset the value from a variable (remove it)

section.title: Scope 'config'
section.screen: Scope 'config' (6 commands) ----------------------------------- config:delete Delete Configurations config:set Update a given Configuration with given properties config:details Print the content of a Configurations config:list List configurations config:del Delate a given set of property from a given Configuration. config:create Create Configurations

section.title: Scope 'newsfeed'
section.screen: Scope 'newsfeed' (1 commands) ----------------------------------- newsfeed:get-news Gets the latest Peergreen news.

section.title: Scope 'deployment'
section.screen: Scope 'deployment' (5 commands) ----------------------------------- deployment:undeploy-artifact Undeploy the given artifact in the system. deployment:list List managed artifacts in the system. deployment:deploy-artifact Deploy the given artifact in the system. deployment:report-artifact Display report of an artifact deployed in the system. deployment:update-artifact Update the given artifact in the system.

section.title: Scope 'felix'
section.screen: Scope 'felix' (23 commands) ----------------------------------- felix:bundlelevel set bundle start level or initial bun dle start level felix:bundlelevel query bundle start level felix:frameworklevel query framework active start level felix:frameworklevel set framework active start level felix:headers display bundle headers felix:install install bundle using URLs felix:lb list installed bundles matching a substring felix:lb list all installed bundles felix:log display some matching log entries felix:log display all matching log entries felix:refresh refresh bundles felix:resolve resolve bundles felix:start start bundles felix:stop stop bundles felix:uninstall uninstall bundles felix:update update bundle from URL felix:update update bundle felix:which determines from where a bundle loads a class felix:inspect inspects bundle capabilities and requirements felix:cd change current directory felix:cd get current directory felix:ls get specified path contents felix:ls get current directory contents

section.title: Scope 'javavm'
section.screen: Scope 'javavm' (6 commands) ----------------------------------- javavm:memory Display details of the JVM's memory usage. javavm:thread-dump List Thread(s) and their stack traces. javavm:threads Display the hierarchy of Threads and ThreadGroup containers. javavm:dead-locks Display deadlocks (if any) javavm:thread-list List Thread(s) and their stack traces. javavm:kill-thread Try to force Thread exit.

section.title: Scope 'info'
section.screen: Scope 'info' (8 commands) ----------------------------------- info:platform info:runtime info:event info:events info:events info:elapsed info:elapsed info:elapsed
